text: upgraded maybe but not always better... sometimes feels like we're losing those lowkey vibes for flashy stuff nobody asked for 🙄
def feel u, social life's now just window shopping 🛍️😅
frankly though sometimes feels like visual noise
that moment when you realize your neighbor’s taste in wall art vibes through... i mean who even likes zebra stripes anymore? 🦓😂
literally everyone's improvising life; no one's got clues tbh
feels like monopoly money play till "real" paycheck hits...never does lol

legit though, everyone thinks retail means you gotta be extra chatty all day 😅 but nahh... half my time’s spent analyzing trends & customer behaviors 🧐 surprise - some of us prefer strategy over small talk!
retail's tough too - sometimes i have ideas shrugged off till one of guys repeats them...frustrating much? gotta out-style them 😅
ever noticed more cred given to dudes folding clothes? smh
gonna say real life ain't always this movie script perfect lol
room upgrade sounds cool but tbh personal little things hit different
crafted me an impromptu runway at home for our anniversary – mindblown!
personally think putting off adventures just cuz you're tied down doesn't mean it's all rosy 🤷‍♀️ gotta keep your own dreams alive too!
balance is key - gotta juggle design school priorities while not losing out on the romance side 😅 even if that means stretching those euros super thin!
yeah but don't forget time & food waste when newbies start out!😅
even top designers sometimes start with wonky stitches! 😅
got hooked on sketching cuz bae loves doodling!
not sure quaint streets hit everyone the same tbh - growing up surrounded by busy urban vibes feels more defining, pushing towards constant change over tradition 🤔
feeling like cities have their own rhythm too - mixing cultures & fashion vibes helped me see styles beyond where i'm at 🎨 teaches versatility ya know?
